title: Jargon
description: A bot that analyses terms-and-conditions and provides a summary of the key points using Named Entity Recognition.

title: iDEA community website
description: A website for the iDEA community of Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham   to share their projects and ideas. Written in React. Singlehandedly developed the website.

title: Twitter Disaster Classification
description: A multi-binned classifer that can look for specific disasters in tweet content. It is integrated with a tweet scraping pipeline that simultaneously also predicts the disasters.
